text:
Britain's Prince William and Duchess of Cambridge Catherine with their children, Prince George and Princess Charlotte, in a photograph taken in October last year.— Photo: AFP

Prince William, father of two, recently revealed that he has changed since he became a dad.

The 33-year-old Duke of Cambridge said he is lot more emotional than he used to be after Prince George and Princess Charlotte came into his life, reports E! Online .

He said that earlier he never really worried about things.

“But now the smallest little things, you well up a little more, you get affected by the sort of things that happen around the world or whatever a lot more, I think, as a father,” he said. — ANI
title: Parenthood has made Prince “more emotional”
